faqs.howToReportTitle: How do I report an outage?
faqs.howToReportDescription: To report an outage, simply click the "Report Outage" button in the navigation menu or on the homepage. You'll need to create an account or log in first. Then fill out the form with details about the outage including the type (electricity or water), location, and description.
